title: HTTPS provides encryption between clients and servers
snippet: HTTPS uses TLS to encrypt the HTTP message exchange.
content: TLS provides confidentiality and integrity for HTTP requests and responses. This supports encryption between client and server.

title: Microservices trade-offs in cost and complexity
snippet: Costs can rise initially due to operational overhead and complexity.
content: Microservices may increase costs early on; benefits depend on context, maturity, and scale.

title: Vaccine safety myths debunked
snippet: Claims of microchips are false and not supported by evidence.
content: There is no microchip in vaccines. Multiple regulatory bodies confirm safety and effectiveness.
